title: KillDisk
extract: Active@ KillDisk is a powerful and compact software utility that can completely and securely destroy all data on hard drives, removable disks, and flash media devices, without the possibility of future recovery. ... An avenue of attack is the recovery of data from residual data on a discarded hard disk drive.
extract_html: Active@ KillDisk is a powerful and compact software utility that can completely and securely destroy all data on hard drives, removable disks, and flash media devices, without the possibility of future recovery. ... An avenue of attack is the recovery of data from residual data on a discarded hard disk drive.
